compat-change.description: Require the hosting job to specify a network constraint if the included {@link android.app.job.JobWorkItem} indicates network usage.
compat-change.name: REQUIRE_NETWORK_CONSTRAINT_FOR_NETWORK_JOB_WORK_ITEMS

compat-change.description: Require the app to have the ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE permissions when scheduling a job with a connectivity constraint.
compat-change.name: REQUIRE_NETWORK_PERMISSIONS_FOR_CONNECTIVITY_JOBS

compat-change.description: Throw an exception when biases are set by an unsupported client.
compat-change.name: THROW_ON_UNSUPPORTED_BIAS_USAGE
